titles.title: Boku wa Sonzai Shiteinakatta
僕は存在していなかった

anime.description: Music video for the debut single of the "dimension-crossing" idol group 22/7.

externalentity.identifier: 僕は存在していなかった

character.name: Maruyama Akane
character.description: Reticent and always level-headed. She has very few emotional swings and thinks rationally at all times, so people around her think she is like a robot. She is good at cooking, and her hobby is to collect bath salts. Source: Official English website

character.name: Satou Reika
character.description: A model student that is honest and hates anything crooked. An unreliable father has had some effect in shaping her personality. She is usually a responsible girl, but sometimes she can act airheaded, and people tease her for that. Source: Official English website

character.name: Toda Jun
character.description: An overwhelmingly bright girl. Oftentimes she goes too far and people feel she is an idiot. She has her childish sides, but she`s always true to her heart and tries her best in everything she does. Loves fried food and sweets. Source: Official English website

character.name: Saitou Nicole
character.description: A stoic, hard worker. She makes a daily effort to become the ideal idol that she envisions in her mind. She is harsh on herself as well as others, and sometimes sounds harsh when talking to those around her. Her favorite animal is a rabbit. Source: Official English website

character.name: Kouno Miyako
character.description: A bright, energetic, talkative girl from Osaka. Oldest of seven, she takes good care of her siblings. A mood-setter. Loves comedy shows and she can be both the comic or the straight man. Her favorite food is okonomiyaki (Japanese savory pancake). Source: Official English website

character.name: Takigawa Miu
character.description: Introverted and not good at conversing with others. Due to her slightly awkward personality, she has problems smiling in front of the customers at her part-time job. Thinks dearly of her mother and little sister. Source: Official English website

character.name: Tachikawa Ayaka
character.description: Youngest of three sisters. Her older sisters have caused her to be a bit more philosophical. She forges her own path and remain unaffected by others. She has a strong will, but also has a side that looks out after others. She is the most charismatic one of the group. Source: Official English website

character.name: Fujima Sakura
character.description: A girl who grew up in Los Angeles. Good with English, but terrible with Japanese kanji. Since she was raised by her grandmother in place of her parents who were busy with work, she is very close to her grandmother. Her favorite food is smashed cucumbers with plum dressing. Source: Official English website
